rooms.name: Living Area & Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: A combined space that includes both the open-plan kitchen and living area with sufficient natural light and ventilation, using cost-effective materials. The layout is designed to adhere to local building norms and Vastu principles by aligning main entrances and windows to capture positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed for privacy and comfort. Features include built-in closets, a small walk-in area, and adherence to Vastu principles by ensuring the bed is placed in the south-east corner for stability.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom for the other family member(s) with storage solutions and sufficient ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Another bedroom designed with simple and practical features.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space with ergonomic furniture and proper ventilation, placed in a quiet corner of the house per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: An open and airy terrace designed for relaxation and outdoor living. It features budget-friendly landscaping options, seating areas, and an orientation that aligns with Vastu principles by capturing the positive energy of the sun during mornings.
